Customer: Can I return a shirt I bought last week?
Employee: Yes, you can return it within 30 days with the receipt.

Customer: Do you have this jacket in size large?
Employee: Let me check the stock for you. One moment, please.

Customer: What are your store hours?
Employee: We are open from 9 AM to 9 PM, Monday to Saturday, and 10 AM to 6 PM on Sundays.

Customer: Is there a discount on summer dresses?
Employee: Yes, we have a 20% discount on all summer dresses this week.

Customer: Do you offer gift wrapping services?
Employee: Yes, we do offer gift wrapping for an additional $5.

Customer: Can I get a refund for a damaged product?
Employee: Yes, please bring the product and the receipt, and we will process your refund.

Customer: How can I track my online order?
Employee: You can track your order using the tracking number provided in the confirmation email.

Customer: Do you have any eco-friendly products?
Employee: Yes, we have a section dedicated to eco-friendly and sustainable products.

Customer: Can I exchange this shirt for a different size?
Employee: Absolutely, you can exchange it for a different size if it's in stock.

Customer: What is your return policy?
Employee: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days with the original receipt.

Customer: Do you offer student discounts?
Employee: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for students with a valid ID.

Customer: Can I place an order over the phone?
Employee: Yes, you can place an order over the phone by calling our customer service.

Customer: Do you have any loyalty programs?
Employee: Yes, we have a loyalty program where you earn points with every purchase.

Customer: Is there a sale on winter coats?
Employee: Yes, we currently have a 30% discount on all winter coats.

Customer: Can I get my purchase delivered to my home?
Employee: Yes, we offer home delivery services for online and in-store purchases.

Customer: Do you sell gift cards?
Employee: Yes, we sell gift cards in various denominations.

Customer: What sizes do you have for this dress?
Employee: This dress is available in sizes XS to XL.

Customer: Can I reserve an item and pick it up later?
Employee: Yes, you can reserve an item online and pick it up in-store within 24 hours.

Customer: Do you offer alterations?
Employee: Yes, we offer alteration services for an additional fee.

Customer: How can I apply for a job at your store?
Employee: You can apply for a job by visiting our careers page on our website.

Customer: Do you have maternity clothing?
Employee: Yes, we have a section dedicated to maternity clothing.

Customer: Can I use multiple discount codes on one purchase?
Employee: Unfortunately, you can only use one discount code per purchase.

Customer: How long does shipping take?
Employee: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days.

Customer: Do you have any new arrivals?
Employee: Yes, we have new arrivals every week. You can check our latest collection online or in-store.

Customer: Can I cancel my order?
Employee: Yes, you can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it.

Customer: Do you offer personal shopping assistance?
Employee: Yes, we offer personal shopping assistance by appointment.

Customer: Are your clothes true to size?
Employee: Most of our clothes are true to size, but we recommend checking the size guide on our website.

Customer: Do you sell plus-size clothing?
Employee: Yes, we offer a range of plus-size clothing.

Customer: Can I return an online purchase in-store?
Employee: Yes, you can return online purchases in-store with the receipt.

Customer: Do you offer international shipping?
Employee: Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries.

Customer: What payment methods do you accept?
Employee: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal.

Customer: Can I pre-order an upcoming item?
Employee: Yes, you can pre-order items that are marked as available for pre-order on our website.

Customer: Do you have a size chart?
Employee: Yes, we have a size chart available on our website.

Customer: Is this item available in other colors?
Employee: Yes, this item is available in several colors. You can check the options online or ask an associate in-store.

Customer: Can I get a price adjustment if an item I bought goes on sale?
Employee: Yes, we offer price adjustments within 14 days of purchase.

Customer: Do you offer gift receipts?
Employee: Yes, we offer gift receipts upon request.

Customer: Can I combine online and in-store purchases for discounts?
Employee: Currently, discounts cannot be combined across online and in-store purchases.

Customer: Do you have vegan leather products?
Employee: Yes, we have a selection of vegan leather products.

Customer: Can I return an item without a receipt?
Employee: We can offer store credit for returns without a receipt.

Customer: Do you have any exclusive online deals?
Employee: Yes, we have exclusive deals available only on our website.

Customer: How can I sign up for your newsletter?
Employee: You can sign up for our newsletter on our website to receive the latest updates and offers.

Customer: Can I use a promo code in-store?
Employee: Some promo codes are online-only, but many can be used in-store as well. Please check the terms and conditions of the promo code.

Customer: Do you have a sale section?
Employee: Yes, we have a sale section both online and in-store.

Customer: Can I get an item shipped to a different address?
Employee: Yes, you can specify a different shipping address at checkout.

Customer: Do you offer any special discounts for first-time buyers?
Employee: Yes, first-time buyers can sign up for a 10% discount on their first purchase.

Customer: What is the status of my order?
Employee: You can check the status of your order using the tracking number provided in your confirmation email.

Customer: Do you have an app for easier shopping?
Employee: Yes, we have a mobile app available for download on iOS and Android.

Customer: Can I pay with Apple Pay?
Employee: Yes, we accept Apple Pay in-store and online.

Customer: What is your exchange policy?
Employee: Our exchange policy allows exchanges within 30 days with the original receipt.
